interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Will Smith - Seven Pounds
Review Date: 2015/03/29
Store: Will Smith  (Actor, Producer),     Rosario Dawson  (Actor),     Gabriele Muccino  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Academy Award® nominee Will Smith (2006, Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role, The Pursuit of Happyness) stars as Ben Thomas, a man at a crossroads searching for a way to redeem his heavy conscience. He discovers he has the power to change the circumstances of seven strangers who deserve a second chance. But when one of them captures his heart, he must decide if he should reveal his secret -- even if it means giving up on his plan. From the creators of The Pursuit of Happyness, SEVEN POUNDS is an "emotionally charged, captivating mystery with a soulful, tender love story and a tearful but joyfully inspiring ending" (MOVIEGUIDE®).', 'Amazon.com', 'The mysteriously titled', 'Seven Pounds', 'stars Will Smith as Ben Thomas, who flashes his badge as an IRS agent to gain entrance into the lives of seven strangers in need. To each, he offers something that will reverse their troubles, seeking to atone for a haunting past mistake. But when Ben starts falling in love with a young woman with heart trouble (Rosario Dawson), his carefully laid plans threaten to collapse. To reveal more of the story would diminish it. Smith is an engaging, charismatic presence, but the impact of', 'Seven Pounds', 'comes from Dawson--she has the kind of emotional transparency that shimmers off the screen. Which is crucial, because Seven Pounds requires considerable suspension of disbelief; some scenes push and pull at plausibility, and you may question a few plot turns after the movie is over. But as the story unfolds, the performances can carry you over these bumps. If you surrender to its gently circling rhythms and its luminous images (including the glowing undulations of a poisonous jellyfish),', 'Seven Pounds', 'will pack an emotional wallop, heartbreaking and uplifting at the same time. Also featuring Barry Pepper (', 'Saving Private Ryan', '), Michael Ealy (', 'Sleeper Cell', '), and Woody Harrelson.', '--Bret Fetzer', 'Stills from', 'Seven Pounds', '(click for larger image)']
Average Rating: 4.7

Review Text: Super fast shipping, perfect compliment to my collection.
Review Title: Super Fast Shipping, ordered while standing in Best Buy waiting for them to check and see about their shipping.
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Harry Potter Double Feature: The Deathly Hallows Part 1 & 2
Daniel Radcliffe  (Actor),     Rupert Grint  (Actor),     David Yates  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Characters & Series, Harry Potter, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
['Harry Potter Double Feature: Year 7 (DBFE) (DVD)', 'In the first part of the seventh and final adventure, Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on their perilous mission to track down and destroy the secret to Voldemort\'s immortality and destruction -- the Horcruxes. On their own, without the guidance of their professors or the protection of Dumbledore, the three friends must now rely on one another more than ever. But there are Dark Forces in their midst that threaten to tear them apart. The motion picture event of the generation comes to a close in the second part of the final chapter in the monumental Harry Potter series.Following 2010\'s first installment, the boy wizard\'s final adventure concludes with the climactic final battle between "The Boy Who Lived "and the Dark Lord Voldemort.', ']]>']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: Maintains a strong passion for the Harry Potter franchise and enjoys diverse film narratives, with a recent inclination toward emotionally engaging dramas.
- **Genres**: Favors fantasy, science fiction, and family-oriented films, while also appreciating drama and romance that encompass elements of mystery and suspense.
- **Purchase Behavior**: Continues to value speed and efficiency, highlighted by a recent experience emphasizing super fast shipping, aligning with a desire for prompt service.
- **Media Format Preference**: Shows a solid preference for DVD format but is open to multiple formats for a variety of media consumption.
- **Content Rating**: Comfortable with PG-13 rated content, suggesting an audience that might relate to family themes or resonate with younger viewers.
- **Collecting Behavior**: Actively invests in building their movie collection, indicating a deep passion for ownership and meticulous curation of media.
- **Quality Over Quantity**: Prioritizes high product quality, consistently rating purchases highly, reflecting a commitment to well-crafted and enjoyable viewing experiences.
- **Familiar Contributors**: Engages with known actors and directors, exhibiting brand loyalty within the entertainment realm.

The user clearly demonstrates a profound appreciation for cinematic storytelling that combines emotional depth and rapid acquisition of quality content.
